This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**TF1.5 Episodic arid floodplains**](/efg-info/TF1_5.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/TF1_5_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: TF1.5.web.map v2.0.

> Locations of pan, brackish and saline wetlands were taken from the Global Lakes and Wetlands Database GLWD3 class 7 from Lehner and Döll (2004). 

::: {.cell}

:::



::: {.cell}

:::

 Resolution: ca. 1km2, static.
 Accuracy evaluation: quantitative (subsets).

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Web navigation (**code: TF1.5.web.map**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.5.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**TF1.5.web.map** (v2.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/TF1.5.web.map_v2.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091060){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/TF1.5.web.map_v2.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](TF1.5.web.map_v2.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**TF1.5.WM.nwx** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.TF1_5_WM_nwx){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
